Hi! I am Bikram, and this is my website thing. I am an engineer, a researcher, a scientist or something in between.


I am a member of the Applied Research & Technology team of Collins Aerospace, Raytheon Technologies. I develop and adapt, algorithms and technologies (mostly AI related) for applications in Autonomy & I4.0 transformation in aviation and aerospace.

I am skilled in Computer Vision, Reinforcement Learning, & Physics-based modelling. You can take a look at my CV here. You can also connect to me via email.

When I am not working I am probably at the gym or trying to find the best brewing conditions for my espresso.

You can find me on linkedIn, Github or twitter
